\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 77803}

\subsection*{But It's Been Months}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Me}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 60 mg & oral & DXM & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I just tested positive for trace amounts of opiates, which I have not taken for at least a few months. However, for 4-5 days before the test I had 60mg/d DXM (dextromethorphan). I suspect this to be the culprit, otherwise I had only consumed some phenethylamines and 2cb.

\end{document}
